meaningMnemonic: You take a <kanji>dose</kanji> of medicine but it gets <kanji>lock</kanji>ed in your throat because it's the kind of <vocabulary>pill</vocabulary> you chew, not swallow! You need to pay attention to which one is which or it won't help at all.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
